interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sia Botanics Vitamin C + Lemon Peel Brightening Cleanser Concentrate (4 oz)
Review Date: 2021/04/24
Store: Sia Botanics
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Sia Botanics', 'Scent': 'Lemon', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '4.13 x 1.93 x 1.93 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '713757593908'}
Review Text: I just washed my face with this Sia C + Lemon Peel wash. It lathered nicely in my hands and on my face. It has a soft lemony scent. It rinsed well - and this is where you'll feel the difference. You know the phrase 'squeaky clean'? That's what you'll feel. There's absolutely no residue left behind. If you've used Noxema to wash your face, it has a similar effect. Because I'm prone to dry skin, I had to apply cream immediately. The label on the bottle suggests washing with this, then using a toner, followed by Vitamin C. Makes sense as your skin is stripped of everything and is ready for some TLC. I think this is an ideal wash for people with oily or combination skin. For me, this will be a great summer wash to control the shine (oil). If you're skin is dry like mine, then moisturize immediately after using.
Review Title: Lemony face wash 🍋
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

We make you sure that all our Designer Bindis are made to get compliments from your love once, definitely you will satisfied and like Collection so buy with confidence .But in any case if our creation doesn’t meet upto your expectations for Any Reason, with in Amazon FBA Time Frame You Can Return it as it is as You Received & we will give you Full Refund .*", 'HOW TO USE:', 'All gems are applied just like a sticker and can be used a few times, once the glue has dried out they can be', 're-used using eyelash glue.', "✮ 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: If, for whatever reason, you don't absolutely love your order, simply return it, and we'll refund every penny (or send a replacement, if there is a problem).", '✮ QUICK DELIVERY:', 'Amazon prime will deliver your beauty products to you as soon as possible for your parties, festivals and holidays.']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.51 x 3.39 x 0.71 inches; 0.56 Ounces', 'Department': 'Womens', 'UPC': '688039336644', 'Manufacturer': 'Sheesham IVY LLP'}
After reading all the reviews, I knew there might be a sticking issue. So, in preparation I also ordered clear eyelash glue. I think that did the trick. I didn't have an issue getting them off the paper as some people mentioned - just be careful knowing they're small & delicate. I used a tweezer. It's fun to have a temporary nose stud! Now trying to figure out exactly where to place it was the challenge for me.
Temporary Fashion Statement
Elfina Hair Cutting Shears, 6.0" Professional Stainless Barber Scissors Set for Hairdressing, Thinning, Texturizing, Salon or Home Use - Flat Shears, Tooth Shears, Comb & Hair Clip Included (Pink)
ELFINA
{'Brand': 'ELFINA', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 3.5 x 1 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BE-HS-GPINK', 'Manufacturer': 'ELFINA'}
Scissors work great. That's all I needed though. I don't have any use for the thinner. I would've preferred a cape instead.
Good scissors
Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce
Bioré
['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.']
{'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'}
The first thing I noticed when I used the product was the delicate scent. It's very nice and stays on you for awhile. So, you pump out the 'gel' which I would call soap except for the fact that it doesn't lather much. Instructions say to pump in your hand then apply to face. I tried that, but my face felt too dry, so I moistened it a little bit and then applied the gel. I rinsed it off well and patted my skin dry. Within seconds I felt my skin drying up. If you have really dry skin, you know what I mean - that taut feeling you try to avoid. I had to get some cream and moisturize right away. I'm guessing there must be something like alcohol in this makeup remover. If you have oily skin or perhaps you're trying to remove a heavy foundation - this may be a good choice for you. But since I wear light makeup and have very dry skin, I can't use this. I'll try it again in the summer when my skin produces more oil as the scent is really nice and makes it worth a second try.
Not for dry skin
Sia Botanics Vitamin C + Lemon Peel Brightening Cleanser Concentrate (4 oz)
Sia Botanics

I just washed my face with this Sia C + Lemon Peel wash. It lathered nicely in my hands and on my face. It has a soft lemony scent. It rinsed well - and this is where you'll feel the difference. You know the phrase 'squeaky clean'? That's what you'll feel. There's absolutely no residue left behind. If you've used Noxema to wash your face, it has a similar effect. Because I'm prone to dry skin, I had to apply cream immediately. The label on the bottle suggests washing with this, then using a toner, followed by Vitamin C. Makes sense as your skin is stripped of everything and is ready for some TLC. I think this is an ideal wash for people with oily or combination skin. For me, this will be a great summer wash to control the shine (oil). If you're skin is dry like mine, then moisturize immediately after using.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Aesthetic Preferences**: Enjoys decorative body art, particularly items that enhance personal style, such as bindis and temporary fashion accessories.

- **Fashion Experimentation**: Open to trying new trends and styles, demonstrated by the interest in a temporary nose stud and the exploration of different placements.

- **Practical Usage and Versatility**: Values multifunctional products that can be used for various occasions, suggesting a preference for items that complement different outfits or settings, as well as tools for personal grooming.

- **Attention to Detail**: Exhibits carefulness and precision when using delicate accessories, indicated by meticulous application techniques and awareness of potential sticking issues.

- **Problem-Solving Approach**: Proactive in seeking solutions and enhancing product performance, showing a resourceful mindset.

- **Satisfaction-Oriented**: Prioritizes product authenticity, quality, and customer service, reflected in appreciation for return policies and guarantees.

- **Community Engagement**: Engaged with user reviews to inform purchase decisions, indicating a reliance on collective experiences to guide better outcomes.

- **Practical Grooming Engagement**: Maintains personal appearance with quality grooming tools, emphasizing functionality.

- **Skin Sensitivity Awareness**: Values products suitable for dry skin and is open to reassessing their effectiveness, particularly in different seasons. Recent experience highlights a preference for cleansers that provide a deep clean, suitable for oily or combination skin, while reinforcing the need for immediate moisturization post-use.

Overall, the user embodies a blend of creativity, resourcefulness, and a focus on practicality and quality in their fashion, beauty, and grooming choices.
